titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon, to the inhabitants of his county of Willts.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our court at Oxford, this second day of November, in the eighteenth yeare of Our reigne.".
Place and date of imprint from Wing.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
